comment._content: Are the two worker gents wearing clogs?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/46999520@N02] They are indeed! They may have been from Belgium or Holland. This factory (and large scale sugar beet processing in Ireland) was set up with help from a Belgian firm, Lippens.
